Articles.Content:
Been playing KSP on mac for a while, I like the idea of 64bit and more RAM access so I installed dual boot Ubuntu 14.04. I'm aware of some of the issues associated with Linux, but this is not one I've been able to find anywhere...

![SC3UwR7.png](http://i.imgur.com/SC3UwR7.png)

That looks like the problem with anti-aliasing in Unity on Linux. Try disabling anti-aliasing in the game. If you want anti-aliasing, you can enable it in the graphics driver. There's more discussion in [this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124254-VAB-SPH-inaccessible-due-to-graphical-bugs-%28game-unplayable%29).
